Class Ladder

java.lang.Object
game.obstacles.Ladder
All Implemented Interfaces:
city.cs.engine.SensorListener, EventListener
public class Ladder extends Object implements city.cs.engine.SensorListener
A ladder made of stacked sections that teleports the cat up or down.
